question.text: The term test-tube baby implies that

options.text: Fertilization of ovum takes place in the uterus but develops in the test-tube
Fertilization of ovum takes place in the test-tube and develops in test-tube itself
Fertilization of ovum takes place in the test-tube but it develops in the uterus
Fertilization of ovum takes place in the fallopian tube and embryo develops in the uterus

solution.text: A test-tube baby is a term that refers to a child that is conceived outside the woman's body. The process is referred to as In-vitro fertilization. The sperm and ovum fuses outside the body. The fertilised egg is then later-on implanted in the uterus of the female.
